London, UK - EDITD

http://editd.com/jobs/engineering/

Data science, devops, engineering. Python & Javascript primarily, hiring 5 engineers now.

I'm the technical cofounder, and I've never worked with a smarter group of people in one place. It's a great team, doing important things for the fourth biggest industry in the world (fashion), helping them reduce waste and be more efficient. We have a beautiful webapp, used every day by hundreds of people at ASOS, Gilt Groupe, Target, Gap and more.
